Event: this is gonna sound really sad & depressing but I really really miss my uncle Sam
Post: "I miss my uncle Sam. It feels like a part of me is missing, and I'm left with a sense of emptiness that I can't shake off. I keep thinking about all the memories we shared, and how much he impacted my life. His passing has made me question everything, from my own mortality to the meaning of life. It's like a cloud of sadness follows me everywhere, and I can't seem to shake it off. I feel like I'll never be able to find happiness again, like it's all been sucked out of me. I wish I could turn back time and spend more moments with him, but life had other plans. Rest in peace, Uncle Sam. You will always be in my thoughts."
